title: Google\Cloud\Asset\V1\BatchGetEffectiveIamPoliciesRequest
name: BatchGetEffectiveIamPoliciesRequest
description:
A request message for [AssetService.BatchGetEffectiveIamPolicies][google.cloud.asset.v1.AssetService.BatchGetEffectiveIamPolicies].

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.asset.v1.BatchGetEffectiveIamPoliciesRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.scope
params.description: Required. Only IAM policies on or below the scope will be returned. This can only be an organization number (such as "organizations/123"), a folder number (such as "folders/123"), a project ID (such as "projects/my-project-id"), or a project number (such as "projects/12345"). To know how to get organization id, visit here . To know how to get folder or project id, visit here .

params.name: data.names
params.description: Required. The names refer to the [full_resource_names] (https://cloud.google.com/asset-inventory/docs/resource-name-format) of searchable asset types. A maximum of 20 resources' effective policies can be retrieved in a batch.
